mapper.sql: a.item_class AS "itemClass", a.item_code AS "itemCode", a.item_name AS "itemName", a.item_spec AS "itemSpec", a.units AS "units", a.price AS "price", a.prefer_price AS "preferPrice", a.foreigner_price AS "foreignerPrice", a.performed_by AS "performedBy", a.fee_type_mask AS "feeTypeMask", a.class_on_inp_rcpt AS "classOnInpRcpt", a.class_on_outp_rcpt AS "classOnOutpRcpt", a.class_on_reckoning AS "classOnReckoning", a.subj_code AS "subjCode", a.class_on_mr AS "classOnMr", a.memo AS "memo", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.stop_date AS "stopDate", a.operator AS "operator", a.enter_date AS "enterDate", a.high_price AS "highPrice", a.material_code AS "materialCode", a.score_1 AS "score1", a.score_2 AS "score2", a.price_name_code AS "priceNameCode", a.control_flag AS "controlFlag", a.input_code AS "inputCode", a.input_code_wb AS "inputCodeWb", a.std_code_1 AS "stdCode1", a.changed_memo AS "changedMemo", a.class_on_insur_mr AS "classOnInsurMr", a.cwtj_code AS "cwtjCode", a.xm_wy AS "xmWy", a.lb_wy AS "lbWy", a.mzsj_wy AS "mzsjWy", a.zysj_wy AS "zysjWy", a.group_flag AS "groupFlag", a.stop_operator AS "stopOperator", a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM price_list a WHERE a.input_code LIKE UPPER(#{inputCode}) and a.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO price_list( item_class, item_code, item_name, item_spec, units, price, prefer_price, foreigner_price, performed_by, fee_type_mask, class_on_inp_rcpt, class_on_outp_rcpt, class_on_reckoning, subj_code, class_on_mr, memo, start_date, stop_date, operator, enter_date, high_price, material_code, score_1, score_2, price_name_code, control_flag, input_code, input_code_wb, std_code_1, changed_memo, class_on_insur_mr, cwtj_code, xm_wy, lb_wy, mzsj_wy, zysj_wy, group_flag, stop_operator, id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{itemClass}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemSpec}, #{units}, #{price}, #{preferPrice}, #{foreignerPrice}, #{performedBy}, #{feeTypeMask}, #{classOnInpRcpt}, #{classOnOutpRcpt}, #{classOnReckoning}, #{subjCode}, #{classOnMr}, #{memo}, #{startDate}, #{stopDate}, #{operator}, #{enterDate}, #{highPrice}, #{materialCode}, #{score1}, #{score2}, #{priceNameCode}, #{controlFlag}, #{inputCode}, #{inputCodeWb}, #{stdCode1}, #{changedMemo}, #{classOnInsurMr}, #{cwtjCode}, #{xmWy}, #{lbWy}, #{mzsjWy}, #{zysjWy}, #{groupFlag}, #{stopOperator}, #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE price_list SET item_class = #{itemClass}, item_code = #{itemCode}, item_name = #{itemName}, item_spec = #{itemSpec}, units = #{units}, price = #{price}, prefer_price = #{preferPrice}, foreigner_price = #{foreignerPrice}, performed_by = #{performedBy}, fee_type_mask = #{feeTypeMask}, class_on_inp_rcpt = #{classOnInpRcpt}, class_on_outp_rcpt = #{classOnOutpRcpt}, class_on_reckoning = #{classOnReckoning}, subj_code = #{subjCode}, class_on_mr = #{classOnMr}, memo = #{memo}, start_date = #{startDate}, stop_date = #{stopDate}, operator = #{operator}, enter_date = #{enterDate}, high_price = #{highPrice}, material_code = #{materialCode}, score_1 = #{score1}, score_2 = #{score2}, price_name_code = #{priceNameCode}, control_flag = #{controlFlag}, input_code = #{inputCode}, input_code_wb = #{inputCodeWb}, std_code_1 = #{stdCode1}, changed_memo = #{changedMemo}, class_on_insur_mr = #{classOnInsurMr}, cwtj_code = #{cwtjCode}, xm_wy = #{xmWy}, lb_wy = #{lbWy}, mzsj_wy = #{mzsjWy}, zysj_wy = #{zysjWy}, group_flag = #{groupFlag}, stop_operator = #{stopOperator}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT , b.label AS "label" FROM current_price_list a,sys_dict b WHERE a.org_id = #{0} and a.item_class=b.value and b.type='BILL_ITEM_CLASS_DICT'
SELECT , b.label AS "label" FROM wx.price_list a,sys_dict b WHERE a.org_id = #{0} and a.item_class=b.value and b.type='BILL_ITEM_CLASS_DICT'

SELECT , b.label AS "label" FROM current_price_list a,sys_dict b WHERE a.item_class=b.value and b.type='BILL_ITEM_CLASS_DICT' and a.org_id = #{0} and a.input_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{1}), '%') and b.label LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{2}), '%')

SELECT , b.label AS "label" FROM wx.price_list a,sys_dict b WHERE a.item_class=b.value and b.type='BILL_ITEM_CLASS_DICT' and a.org_id = #{0} and a.input_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{1}), '%') and b.label LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{2}), '%')
SELECT b.label AS "label" FROM sys_dict b WHERE b.type='BILL_ITEM_CLASS_DICT'
